maqras.text: Loka kisa ciza bare pucha rahe hana
Usa vadi sucana bare
Jisa bare iha loka matabheda karade hana
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ki asim dharati nu pharasa nahim bana'i'a
Ate paharam nu mekham (sahara dena vale khabe)
Ate tuhanu asim' jore-jore bana'i'a
Ate ninda nu tuhadi thakana dura karana la'i bana'i'a
Ate rata nu parada bana'i'a
Ate asim dina nu rozi kama'una da samam bana'i'a
Ate asim tuhade upara sata pake asamana bana'e
Ate asim unham vica ika camakada ho'i'a diva rakha dita
Ate asim pani nala bhare badalam rahi' mohaledhara minha varasa'i'a
Tam ki asim usa de rahim anaja ate sabazi'am uga'i'e
Ate saghane baga
Besaka faisale de dina da samam nisacita hai
Jisa dina sura vica bigala vaja'i'a javega, phira tusim jhudam de jhuda avoge
Ate asamana khaul'ha dita javega, phira usa vica daravaze hi daravaze ho janage
Ate pahara cala dita janage uha reta varage ho janage
Besaka naraka ghata vica hai
Bagi'am da tikana
Usa vica uha lame samem taka pa'e rahinage
Usa vica na uha kise thadaka nu cakhanage ate na pina vali ziza nu
Paratu khaul'hada pani ate (jakhamam di) pika
Unham de karama anusara badala hai
Uha hisaba da dara nahim rakhade sana
Ate unham ne sadi'am a'itam nu sapurana jhuthala' dita
Ate asim hara ciza nu likha ke usa di ginati kara rakhi hai
Tam cakho. Asim tuhadi saza vadha'unde janvage
Besaka darana vali'am la'i safalata hai
Saga ate agura
ate barabara umara vali'am naujavana laraki'am
Ate bhare ho'e jama
Uthe uha mithi'a ate jhuthi'am galam nahim sunanage
Tere raba valom unham de karamam de anusara badala hovega
Rahimana valom jihara akasa ate dharati ate unham de vicakara di'am cizam da palanahara hai. Ko'i takata nahim rakhada ki usa nala gala kare
Jisa dina jibarila ate farisate kataram bana ke kharhe honage, (usa vele) ko'i nahim' bolega. Paratu (usa tom' binham? Jisa nu rahimana agi'a deve ate uha yoga gala kahega)
Iha dina nisacita hai, sau jihara cahe apane raba vala (apana) tikana bana lave
Asim tuhanu nere a jana vali saza tom dara dita hai. Jisa dina manukha usa nu dekha lavega, jihara usa de hatham ne age bheji'a hai tam avagi'akari akhega ki kasa! Maim siti huda
Sahu hai jaram tom putana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, sadhama calana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, tairana vale badalam di
Phira age vadhana vali'am di
phira mamali'am da upa'a karana vali'am di
Jisa dina hila dena vali hila devegi
Usa tom magarom ika hora a'una vali ciza avegi
Kine dila usa tom kaba rahe honage
Unham di'am akham jhuka rahi'am honagi'am
Uha kahide hana ki ki asim pahili halata vica vapisa janvage
Ki jadom sadi'am hadi'am gala sara janagi'am
Unham ne akhi'a ki iha vapasi tam bare ghate vali hovegi
Uha tam basa ika jhiraka hovegi
Phira turata uha maidana vica hazira honage
Ki tuhade kola musa di gala pahuci hai
Jadom ki usa de raba ne usa nu tuva di pavitara ghati vica pukari'a
Phira'auna de kola ja'u uha bagi ho gi'a hai
Phira usa nu pucho, ki ki tainu isa gala di icha hai ki tu sudhara javem
Ate maim tainu tere raba da raha dikhavam, phira tu dare
So musa ne usa nu vadi nisani dikha'i
Phira usa ne jhuthala'i'a ate na mani'a
Phira uha palati'a, yatana karade ho'e
Phira usa ne ikatha kita, phira usa ne pukari'a
So usa ne akhi'a ki maim tuhada sabha tom vada raba ham
Tam alaha ne usa nu praloka ate sasara di saza vica pharhi'a
Besaka isa vica hareka usa bade la'i sikhi'a hai, jihara (alaha tom) dare
Ki tuhada bana'una zi'ada aukha hai jam akasa da, alaha ne usa nu bana'i'a
Usa di chata nu uca kita, phira usa nu thika kita
Phira usa di rata nu haneri bana'i'a ate usa de dina nu prakasavana kita
Ate usa tom ba'ada dharati nu phaila'i'a
Isa vicom usa da pani ate cara kadhi'a
Ate paharam nu sathapita kita
Tuhade la'i ate tuhade pasu'am la'i jivana samagari de rupa vica (paida kita)
Phira jadom uha vadi afata avegi
Jisa dina manukha apane kite nu yada karega
Ate dekhana vali'am de sahamane naraka pragata kara dita javega
Tam jisa ne sagavata kiti
Ate sasarika jivana nu pahila diti
Tam unham da tikana naraka honvega
Ate jihara bada apane raba de sahamane kharhe hona tom dari'a ate apane mana nu buri'am ichavam tom roki'a
Tam usa da tikana janata hovega
Uha ki'amata de sabadha vica puchade hana ki iha kadom vaparegi
Usa di caraca nala tuhada ki sabadha hai
Iha mamala tere raba nala sabadhita hai
Tam tusim sirafa usa bade nu dara'una vale ho, jihara dare
Jisa dina iha usa nu (tam ajiha khi'ala karanage) dekhanage tam jano uha sasara vica thahire hi nahim. Jivem (duni'am vica sirafa) ika sama jam ika savera batita kiti hove
